check_box.label: Always rez objects under the land group if possible
check_box.name: grouplandrez
check_box.tool_tip: Attempts to rez objects under the land group if you're in the land group regardless of which current group tag you're wearing.

check_box.label: Create particle effects when scripts communicate
check_box.name: EffectScriptChatParticles
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled scripted objects display swirling particle lights when the scripts communicate

check_box.label: Deactivate tracking beacon when reaching the targeted avatar (<= 3m)
check_box.name: FSDisableAvatarTrackerAtCloseIn
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, the tracking beacon will be disabled automatically, if the distance to the targeted avatar is less than 3m. (Default)

check_box.label: Fix Bento Idle Animation
check_box.name: play_default_bento_idle_animation_toggle
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, the viewer will run a default, priority 0 bento animation that poses hands, wings, mouth and tail in a natural position when no other bento animation is running.

check_box.label: Disable Login Progress Screen
check_box.name: login_screen_toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Disables the black login progress Screen

check_box.label: Disable Logout Progress Screen
check_box.name: logout_screen_toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Disables the black Logout progress screen.

check_box.label: Enable progressive draw distance stepping
check_box.name: FSRenderFarClipStepping
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, Firestorm will use a progressive draw distance stepping after teleporting.

slider.name: progressive_draw_distance_interval
slider.tool_tip: Interval in seconds between each draw distance increment

check_box.name: UseLSLBridge
check_box.label: Enable LSL-Client Bridge
check_box.tool_tip: Allows the Viewer to use a scripted attachment (Bridge) to extend its features

combo_box.name: UseLSLFlightAssist
combo_box.tool_tip: Enables the script that assists flying and hovering at extended altitudes

slider.name: manual_environment_change_transition_period
slider.label: Environment Transition Time:
slider.tool_tip: Interval in seconds over which manual environment changes will blend. Zero is instant.

check_box.name: EnvironmentPersistAcrossLogin
check_box.label: Persist Environment settings throughout sessions
check_box.tool_tip: Restores the current environment settings after next login.

check_box.name: FSRepeatedEnvTogglesShared
check_box.label: Repeated environment keybinds revert to shared environment
check_box.tool_tip: Causes repeated keybinds (e.g. ctrl+shift+y) to alternate between the requested preset & shared environment

panel.label: Protection
panel.name: ProtectionTab

check_box.label: Allow scripts to show map UI (llMapDestination)
check_box.name: ScriptsCanShowUI

panel.text: Texture Lag Protection (may break some objects):

check_box.label: Automatically hide large objects with high texture area. Threshold:
check_box.name: RenderVolumeSAProtection
check_box.tool_tip: This protects you from objects with very large textures over large surface areas often designed to crash the viewer. Default is 5000 square meters, but if you find that some objects are not rendering and this option is enabled you may need to increase it.

check_box.label: Enable Spam Protection even for objects owned by you
check_box.name: FSUseAntiSpamMine
check_box.tool_tip: This will apply antispam protection even to objects you own.

panel.text: Max lines in a single message:

spinner.name: _NACL_AntiSpamNewlines
spinner.tool_tip: Maximum number of lines to accept in a single text message [Default: 70]

spinner.name: _NACL_AntiSpamAmount
spinner.tool_tip: Maximum number of similar events to accept within 2 seconds from the same source [Default: 10]

spinner.name: _NACL_AntiSpamSoundMulti
spinner.tool_tip: Event multiplier for sound play requests [Default: 10]

spinner.name: _NACL_AntiSpamSoundPreloadMulti
spinner.tool_tip: Event multiplier for sound preload requests [Default: 4]

check_box.label: Confirm before paying. Threshold:
check_box.name: FSConfirmPayments
check_box.tool_tip: Show a confirmation dialog before paying sums greater than the threshold. To always show a confirmation, set the threshold to 0.

spinner.name: FSPaymentConfirmationThreshold
spinner.tool_tip: Show a confirmation dialog before paying sums greater than the threshold. To always show a confirmation, set the threshold to 0.

panel.label: Avatar
panel.name: firestorm_avatar
panel.text: Amount that Avatar's head Follows Mouse (set to '0' for no movement):

slider.label: Vertical range that avatar's head follows mouse:
slider.tool_tip: Vertical range that avatar's head follows mouse (pitch) in degrees
slider.name: PitchFromMousePositionSlider

slider.label: Horizontal range that avatar's head follows mouse:
slider.tool_tip: Horizontal range that avatar's head follows mouse (yaw) in degrees
slider.name: YawFromMousePositionSlider

panel.text: (Avatar look at target settings are on the Privacy tab.)

combo_box.name: BeamColor_combo
combo_box.tool_tip: Select the color preset for the selection beam

slider.name: FSMaxBeamsPerSecond
slider.label: Beam updates/sec:
slider.tool_tip: How many beam updates to send in a second. Default 40

check_box.label: Enable selection beam
check_box.name: SLPartBeam
check_box.tool_tip: Disabling this setting will prevent selection beams from being rendered locally. It does not prevent selection beams being sent to other avatars. If you do not wish to show your selection, you can disable that via Preferences -> Privacy -> LookAt -> Don't send my selection target hints.

check_box.label: Send selection data to chat
check_box.name: FSParticleChat
check_box.tool_tip: Sends selection data (selection start/stop and global position) to chat channel 9000.

combo_box.name: FSBeamShape_combo
combo_box.tool_tip: Select the shape for the particle beam

slider.name: FSBeamShapeScale
slider.label: Scale:
slider.tool_tip: Change the scale of the shape used for the Phoenix Shaped Beam

check_box.label: Allow OpenCollar protocol to enable or disable built in AO
check_box.name: BridgeIntegrationOC

check_box.label: Allow LockMeister protocol to enable or disable built in AO
check_box.name: BridgeIntegrationLM

combo_box.name: combobox shininess
combo_box.tool_tip: Set the amount of shine for the object

check_box.name: FSBuildPrefs_EmbedItem
check_box.label: Embed an item into new prims
Axis on root prim
check_box.tool_tip: Default behaviour is to show the axis on the center of mass of a linkset. If enabled, the axis will be shown on the root prim of the linkset instead.
check_box.name: FSBuildPrefsActualRoot_toggle

check_box.label: Values are percent
check_box.tool_tip: Default settings are Percentages and every axis set at 50
check_box.name: FSPivotPercToggle

combo_box.name: FSScriptingFontName
combo_box.tool_tip: Name of the font used in the LSL script editor

combo_box.name: FSScriptingFontSize
combo_box.tool_tip: Size of the font used in the LSL script editor

check_box.label: Enable LSL preprocessor
check_box.tool_tip: When checked, the LSL preprocessor is enabled.
check_box.name: preproc_checkbox

check_box.label: Script optimizer
check_box.tool_tip: When checked, the LSL preprocessor will optimize space used by scripts.
check_box.name: preprocoptimizer_checkbox

check_box.label: switch() statement
check_box.tool_tip: When checked, the LSL preprocessor will allow the use of the switch() statement for script flow control.
check_box.name: preprocswitch_checkbox

check_box.label: Lazy lists
check_box.tool_tip: When checked, the LSL preprocessor will allow the use of syntax extensions for list handling.
check_box.name: preproclazy_checkbox

check_box.label: #includes from local disk
check_box.tool_tip: When checked, the LSL preprocessor will allow #include statements to reference files on your local disk.
check_box.name: preprocinclude_checkbox

panel.label: Build 2
panel.name: BuildTab2

check_box.label: Enable highlighting of selected prims
check_box.tool_tip: When unchecked, the yellow/blue outline effects are not rendered, improving performance when large numbers of prims are selected.
check_box.name: FSBuildPrefsRenderHighlight_toggle

check_box.label: Highlight boundary of currently selected parcel
check_box.name: RenderParcelSelection

check_box.label: Show boundary up to maximum build height
check_box.name: FSRenderParcelSelectionToMaxBuildHeight

spinner.name: MaxSelectDistance
spinner.tool_tip: Maximum allowed selection distance (meters from avatar) [Default: 128.000]

spinner.name: MaxDragDistance
spinner.tool_tip: Maximum allowed distance in a single operation of move tool (meters from start point) [Default: 48.000]

spinner.name: RotationStep
spinner.tool_tip: All rotations via rotation tool are constrained to multiples of this unit [Default: 1.0]

panel.text: degrees, when not using 'snap to grid'

check_box.label: Show unlink confirmation dialog if linkset has minimum
check_box.name: FSUnlinkConfirmEnabled

check_box.label: Use old "Set Object For Sale" behavior
check_box.tool_tip: When checked, object for sale info is saved on change instead of requiring a confirm.
check_box.name: FSCommitForSaleOnChange_toggle

check_box.label: Save scripts edited from inventory as Mono
check_box.tool_tip: When checked, editing a script directly from inventory and then saving it saves as Mono instead of LSL.
check_box.name: FSSaveInventoryScriptsAsMono_toggle

check_box.label: Save textures from inventory to disk as PNG instead of TGA by default
check_box.tool_tip: Used in the texture preview floater and context menu in inventory.
check_box.name: FSTextureDefaultSaveAsFormat

check_box.label: Use Ctrl+mouse to grab and manipulate objects
check_box.tool_tip: When checked, you will be able to grab and move objects with your mouse and CTRL key.
check_box.name: FSEnableGrab

check_box.label: Allow click-drag or click-scale (together with caps lock) of a texture face in build mode
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, allows to click-drag or click-scale (together with caps lock) a texture face in build mode. This feature is still experimental and should be used with caution.
check_box.name: FSExperimentalDragTexture

check_box.label: Preview animations on own avatar during upload
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, you can preview animations during the upload process on your own avatar
check_box.name: FSUploadAnimationOnOwnAvatar

check_box.label: Always expand animation preview advanced information
check_box.tool_tip: Expand the advanced animation information in the animation preview floater by default
check_box.name: FSAnimationPreviewExpanded

check_box.label: Enable extended script info details
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, extend basic script info feature with various details useful for builders
check_box.name: FSScriptInfoExtended

check_box.label: Sort attachment spots in "Attach to" menus alphabetically (requires restart)
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, the list of attachments spots in the &Attach to& menus will be sorted alphabetically
check_box.name: FSSortAttachmentSpotsAlphabetically

check_box.label: Use the new [APP_NAME] texture panel in the tools floater (requires restart)
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, the texture editing tools will use the refined [APP_NAME] workflow and allow editing of both Blinn-Phong and PBR textures.
check_box.name: FSUseNewTexturePanel

panel.label: Uploads
panel.name: UploadsTab
panel.text: To change a destination folder, right click on it in inventory and choose "Use as default for"
